attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: URGENTLY TO ENACT RETROSPECTIVE LEGISLATION WHICH ENABLES FAILED BANKERS AND OTHER HEADS OF INDUSTRY AND COMMERCE TO BE STRIPPED OF THEIR PENSIONS PROPERTY AND ASSETS AND TO ENABLE FURTHER COMPENSATION OR COMPENSATION AGREEMENTS TO BE OBTAINED FROM THEM.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
